doc.description: This module is an example of an ansible_module.turbo integration.
This module aims to test fail_json method on Ansible.turbo module

params.description: parameter to display in task output

doc.short_description: A short module which honor additional args when calling fail_json

cloud.common.turbo_fail.examples:
- name: Fail without additional arguments
  cloud.common.turbo_fail:

- name: Fail with additional arguments
  cloud.common.turbo_fail:
    params:
        test: "ansible"
